result.pre: and many other important human pathogenic viruses. In most individuals

result.pre: subclinical infection1. However, in 2015 there was increasing evidence that
result.post: is linked to congenital infections leading to spontaneous abortions

result.pre: severe neonatal birth defects2,3. Indeed, it was observed that maternal
result.post: infection can spread to the fetal brains causing the

result.pre: to reduced brain volume and development of microcephaly4,5. In addition,
result.post: infections have been associated with Guillain-Barré syndrome and likely

result.pre: appear in early childhood6. Due to the rapid spread of
